To generate doc with doxygen:

- Remove (or move) c:\Users\h\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\pngcs\docs\html\
- Open "Doxywizard"
- File->open->c:\Users\h\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\pngcs\Doxyfile
- Change version number
- Run doxygen and check


To commit to git:

 - Open Git Bash and do with command line.

To generate distribution:
 
  - Update the assembly version
  - See and run (from Git Bash) buid_dist.sh
